I believe that there should be zero tolerance for pollution. However, I don't believe we have the power to affect climate change of a planet with one exception. How about the atmospheric atomic tests?

I've never had children, so I cannot say I understand completely how hard it must be, especially when they are very young. But how on earth do all these parents forget their babies in hot cars, especially when there are two of them? Can anyone explain this to me? How can you totally forget that you have not one, but two toddlers for hours on end unless you are mentally ill, high, or drunk? I really do believe some people do this on purpose as a way to get rid of their children without having to face murder charges.
Well done, my sisters - so glad you tried (more than a bunch of folks here have done) A woman will pass one day. You have broken ground by trying, kudos to every one of you.

Some of you people are just pathetic. Their are just so much anger and frustration in this country and around the world that it's sickening. Forget about race for a moment and hear the pain and suffering that child is going through, no child should EVER have to go through this, she could be Asian, white, Indian any race honestly the fact is no child should be going through this. It's the same in other countries too but all some of you can do is sit on your behinds and talk crap behind a screen. It's just beyond sickening, it's time for some of you to get your acts together seriously.
